blocks.text: shelve st: decide not to continue with a plan, either for a short time or permanently ( bỏ ngỏ, thôi không tiếp tục 1 kế hoạch, ý tưởng)
A. stockpile: collect and keep a large supply of something (dự trữ số lượng lớn)
B. overthrown: => (to) overthrow sb/st: (to) remove a leader or a government from a position of power by force ( lật đổ lãnh đạo hoặc 1 chính quyền)
D. disrupted: => disrupt: làm gián đoạn
E.g. Bus services will be disrupted tomorrow because of the bridge closure.
Chú ý: Các dạng cấu trúc đảo ngữ với so và such:
1.1. So + adv + auxiliary V + S+ V bare inf + that + clause
e.g. So fluently does he speak English that I almost mixed him up with a native speaker when we first met.
1.2. So + adj + be + N/pronoun + that + clause
e.g. So smart is my brother that he seems to be able to work out the answers  for every single excirsise.
2. Such + be + N/N phrase  + that + clause = N/N phrase + be + such + that + clause
e.g. Such is her beauty that she catches every man’s eye whenever they saw her.
Do đó đáp án đúng là B.
(to) contend with st: have to deal with a problem or with a difficult situation or person

rink: sân trượt tuyết, trượt băng Các đáp án còn lại: B. course: sân golf C. ring: a confined area in which animals or people perform or compete, with seats around the outside for the audience ( thường là sân đấm bốc) D. pitch: an area of ground specially prepared and marked for playing a sports game => a football/cricket/rugby pitch
be the envy of sb/st (idm): be a person or thing that other people admire that causes feeling of envy
